duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead assigned capital projects and engineering resources, ensuring adherence to process safety and budget/schedule maintenance.
Develop estimates, funding documents, and ongoing forecasts for plant executed projects within SAP, while maintaining operability needs of the customer.
Conduct Safety Kickoff Meetings with contractors and operations team, ensuring contractor compliance with safety standards.
Participate in the Safe Work Permit issuance process, lead daily morning safety/toolbox meetings, and report all incidents immediately.
Willingness to work a wide variety of scheduled days and hours, and ability to work without close supervision.
Ensure all contractors on site for project execution have submitted an Emergency Action Plan prior to mobilization.

education_certification.credential: Technical degree (chemical engineering or mechanical engineering preferred)
